name: Locksight
text: The target can observe for 1 full round a lock that he is aware of (or object that includes a lock, such as a chest or door) that is within 60 feet to automatically determine whether it is open, closed, or jammed. If the target creature is trained in Disable Device, by concentrating on a lock for 3 rounds, he can also determine the quality of the lock (simple, average, good, or superior). This spell does not enable the target to see hidden locks, such as those on secret doors.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、材料/法器 (一把小钥匙)
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 目标可以以一个整轮动作，观察60尺他意识到的一个锁(或著包含锁的物体，像是一个箱子或一扇门)，并自动得知这锁是打开的、锁上的，或是卡死的。如果目标生物在解除装置上受训过，他可以专注在这锁上3轮，并得知这锁的品质(简单、复杂、困难或超难)。此法术并不能使目标看到隐藏起来的锁，例如秘门上的锁。
